definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: Ever since I was little, Dad was always trying to tell me what to do.
sentences.chinese: 從我很小的時候起，爹地總是要告述我該作什麼。

sentences.english: To tell you the truth, dad, I never drink spirit even if I am from the northeast.
sentences.chinese: 爹地，說老實話，雖然是東北人，可我從來不喝白酒。

sentences.english: Daddy started to go to town or somewhere else more often than before.
sentences.chinese: 現在爹地比以前更常進城或到其它地方去。

sentences.english: I just wanted to say, ever since I was born, daddy has been the best father.
sentences.chinese: 從我一出生，爹地就是你所能想像到的最棒的父親。

sentences.english: Whispering, daddy, I want you to know.
sentences.chinese: 低聲說著，爹地，我要你知道。

definition: erhua variant of 寶貝|宝贝[bao3 bei4]
Xiaohao (c. 2200 BC), leader of the Dongyi 東夷|东夷[Dong1 yi2] or Eastern Barbarians
auntie, youngest of sisters in mother's family
Abba (Aramaic word father)/by ext. God the Father in Christian gospel
outstanding/above the common/out of the ordinary
